mapper.sql: smei.month_end_inventory_id, smei.storage_id, smei.material_id, smei.box_number, smei.total, smei.`status`, smei.remark, smei.organization_id, smei.create_user_id, smei.create_time, smei.modified_user_id, smei.modified_time, smei.is_delete
mapper.select:
select ,su.user_name AS create_user_name, sus.user_name AS modified_user_name,bo.organization_name ,sw.warehouse_name,swa.warehouse_area_name,ss.storage_name,sm.material_code,sm.material_desc, ssi.quantity,sm.material_name,sss.supplier_name,so.contract_code,smei.material_total FROM storage_month_end_inventory smei LEFT JOIN mes_package_manager mpm ON mpm.bar_code = smei.material_barcode_code LEFT JOIN smt_work_order swo ON swo.work_order_id = mpm.work_order_id LEFT JOIN smt_order so ON so.order_id = swo.order_id left join smt_supplier sss ON sss.supplier_id = so.supplier_id
LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON smei.create_user_id = su.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_user sus ON smei.modified_user_id = sus.user_id LEFT JOIN base_organization bo ON smei.organization_id = bo.organization_id LEFT JOIN smt_storage_inventory ssi ON ssi.storage_id = smei.storage_id and ssi.material_id = smei.material_id LEFT JOIN smt_storage ss on smei.storage_id = ss.storage_id LEFT JOIN smt_warehouse sw on sw.warehouse_id = ss.warehouse_id LEFT JOIN smt_warehouse_area swa on swa.warehouse_area_id = ss.warehouse_area_id LEFT JOIN smt_material sm on sm.material_id = smei.material_id
and sss.supplier_name like CONCAT('%', #{supplierName}, '%')
and so.contract_code like CONCAT('%', #{contractCode}, '%')
and sw.warehouse_name like CONCAT('%', #{warehouseName}, '%')
and swa.warehouse_area_name like CONCAT('%', #{warehouseAreaName}, '%')
and ss.storage_name like CONCAT('%', #{storageName}, '%')
and sm.material_code like CONCAT('%', #{materialCode}, '%')
and sm.material_desc like CONCAT('%', #{materialDesc}, '%')
and sm.material_name like CONCAT('%', #{materialName}, '%')
and smei.create_time like CONCAT(#{month}, '%')
and date_format(smei.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
order by smei.create_time desc

SELECT mpm.work_order_id, ssi.material_id, ssi.storage_id, sss.supplier_name, so.contract_code, sw.warehouse_name, sw.warehouse_id, swa.warehouse_area_name, ssid.material_barcode_code, ss.storage_name, sm.material_code, sm.material_desc, sum(ssid.material_quantity) as total, ssi.quantity as material_total, sm.material_name, sum(if((select is_binding from smt_storage_pallet ssp where ssp.pallet_code = ssid.material_barcode_code)=2,0,if(mpm.type=1,1,mpm.total))) AS box_number, ssid.create_time, sm.version FROM smt_storage_inventory_det ssid LEFT JOIN smt_storage_inventory ssi ON ssi.storage_inventory_id = ssid.storage_inventory_id LEFT JOIN mes_package_manager mpm ON mpm.bar_code = ssid.material_barcode_code LEFT JOIN smt_work_order swo ON swo.work_order_id = mpm.work_order_id LEFT JOIN smt_order so ON so.order_id = swo.order_id left join smt_storage ss on ssi.storage_id = ss.storage_id left join smt_warehouse sw on sw.warehouse_id = ss.warehouse_id left join smt_warehouse_area swa on swa.warehouse_area_id = ss.warehouse_area_id left join smt_material sm on sm.material_id = swo.material_id left join smt_supplier sss ON sss.supplier_id = so.supplier_id group by ssi.storage_id,so.contract_code,sm.material_id HAVING sum( ssid.material_quantity ) > 0
and sss.supplier_name like CONCAT('%', #{supplierName}, '%')
and so.contract_code like CONCAT('%', #{contractCode}, '%')
and sw.warehouse_id = #{warehouseId}
and sw.warehouse_name like CONCAT('%', #{warehouseName}, '%')
and swa.warehouse_area_name like CONCAT('%', #{warehouseAreaName}, '%')
and ss.storage_name like CONCAT('%', #{storageName}, '%')
and sm.material_code like CONCAT('%', #{materialCode}, '%')
and sm.material_desc like CONCAT('%', #{materialDesc}, '%')
and sm.material_name like CONCAT('%', #{materialName}, '%')
and smei.create_time like CONCAT(#{month}, '%')
and date_format(ssid.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
order by ssid.create_time desc
